description: This file defines a utility function 'formatDistanceToNow' that calculates and formats the time elapsed since a given timestamp, converting it into a human-readable string indicating seconds, minutes, hours, or days.

methods.name: formatDistanceToNow(ts)
methods.description: Calculates the difference between the current time and a given timestamp, returning a formatted string representing the elapsed time in seconds, minutes, hours, or days.
